page.title: 03Traffic Survey - Part1
page.content: In September 1938 following the new classification of roads A B etc the ministry of transport carried out a traffic survey just outside of Tempsford to count the flow of traffic.The results taken over a seven day period 16 hours a day were as follows Mo Tu We Th Fr Sa Su {MBi 175 95 83 80 124 278 406 {Car 1983 1514 1595 1667 2099 3048 3555 {Bus 73 49 47 44 70 109 113 {Van 108 121 147 160 168 127 56 {StL 571 699 749 717 663 362 99 {Trc 1 2 5 3 1 0 0 {Bik 403 316 289 337 322 463 585 {HDV 23 27 25 40 31 9 0 {Ped 44 47 38 44 46 73 170 KEY motorbikes cars buses or coaches vans steam lorries tractors push bikes horse drawn vehicles pedestrians.
